crystallographic data

elements.content:
Table 1 Crystallographic data of [Co{1,4-C6H4(CN)2}2{NTf2}2][SnI{Co(CO)4}3]2
Compound [Co{1,4-C6H4(CN)2}2{NTf2}2][SnI{Co(CO)4}3]2
Sum formula Sn2I2Co7S4F12O32N6C44H8
Formula weight 2392.6 g mol−1
Crystal system/space group Triclinic/P
Lattice parameters a = 1182.6(2) pm
b = 1199.1(2) pm
c = 1347.0(3) pm
α = 103.02(3)°
β = 94.88(3)°
γ = 99.91(3)°
V = 1817.9 × 106 pm3
Formula units per cell, Z 1
Density (calculated) 2.19 g cm−3
Measurement conditions Image plate diffractometer IPDS II (STOE) λ(Mo-Kα) = 71.073 pm (T = 200 K)
Measurement limits −16 ≤ h < 15; −16 ≤ k ≤ 16; −18 ≤ l ≤ 16; 2θmax = 58.5
Number of reflections 12853 (independent 9038)
Refinement method Full-matrix least-squares on F2
Merging R int = 0.059
Total number of least squares parameters 493
Largest diff. peak and hole 0.90/−1.30 e × 10−6 pm3
Figures of merit R 1 = 0.0448 [5098 Fo > 4sig(Fo)]
  R 1 (all data) = 0.0925
  wR2 = 0.0790
  GooF = 1.122
Fig. 1 Unit cell of [Co{1,4-C6H4(CN)2}2{NTf2}2][SnI{Co(CO)4}3]2 with coordination polyhedra around Co (red octahedra) and tin (green tetrahedra).
